title: Sound On: Police Reform, Economic Recovery
itunes:title: Sound On: Police Reform, Economic Recovery
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: 

James Hohmann, National Political Correspondent for The Washington Post and Author of The Daily 202, House Majority Whip James Clyburn, Democrat from South Carolina's 6th District, John Sitilides, Geopolitical strategist at Trilogy Advisors and diplomacy consultant to the State Department, and Eli Yokley, Political reporter for Morning Consult.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
